title: Where are some free online courses about basic singing skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to me, Singing is an art, it comes from within, even though you take up classes, what all they will try to make you is to sing with feeling, so it would be better if you sing on yourself and practice daily, look how some decent musicians sing or make musics, and ask any person to give feedback, since you are doing this without any Guru or teacher, you need time to develop some basic skill, so do not loose hope. if you want to start right away, try getting a Vibrato.
I've done an entire YouTube channel devoted to helping people sing.  Tons of lessons including a playlist devoted to beginner studies. Beginner Singing Lessons
